likrisk.description: I like to take risks, to what extent
likrisk.question: To what extent do you like to take risks?

liklead.description: I like to be a leader, to what extent
liklead.question: To what extent do you like to be a leader?

sothnds.description: I am sensitive to othersâ€™ needs
sothnds.question: To what extent are you sensitive to others' needs?

actcomp.description: I act compassionately towards others, to what extent
actcomp.question: To what extent do you act compassionately towards others?

ipcrtiv.description: Important to think new ideas and being creative
ipcrtiv.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. Thinking up new ideas and being creative is important to her/him. She/he likes to do things in her/his own original way.

imprich.description: Important to be rich, have money and expensive things
imprich.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to be rich. She/he wants to have a lot of money and expensive things.

ipeqopt.description: Important that people are treated equally and have equal opportunities
ipeqopt.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. She/he thinks it is important that every person in the world should be treated equally. She/he believes everyone should have equal opportunities in life.

ipshabt.description: Important to show abilities and be admired
ipshabt.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It's important to her/him to show her/his abilities. She/he wants people to admire what she/he does.

impsafe.description: Important to live in secure and safe surroundings
impsafe.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to live in secure surroundings. She/he avoids anything that might endanger her/his safety.

impdiff.description: Important to try new and different things in life
impdiff.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. She/he likes surprises and is always looking for new things to do. She/he thinks it is important to do lots of different things in life.

ipfrule.description: Important to do what is told and follow rules
ipfrule.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. She/he believes that people should do what they're told. She/he thinks people should follow rules at all times, even when no-one is watching.

ipudrst.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to listen to people who are different from her/him. Even when she/he disagrees with them, she/he still wants to understand them.

ipmodst.description: Important to be humble and modest, not draw attention
ipmodst.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to be humble and modest. She/he tries not to draw attention to herself/himself.

ipgdtim.description: Important to have a good time
ipgdtim.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. Having a good time is important to her/him. She/he likes to 'spoil' herself/himself.

impfree.description: Important to make own decisions and be free
impfree.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to make her/his own decisions about what she/he does. She/he likes to be free and not depend on others.

iphlppl.description: Important to help people and care for others' well-being
iphlppl.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is very important to her/him to help the people around her/him. She/he wants to care for their well-being.

ipsuces.description: Important to be successful and that people recognise achievements
ipsuces.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. Being very successful is important to her/him. She/he hopes people will recognise her/his achievements.

ipstrgv.description: Important that government is strong and ensures safety
ipstrgv.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him that the government ensures her/his safety against all threats. She/he wants the state to be strong so it can defend its citizens.

ipadvnt.description: Important to seek adventures and have an exciting life
ipadvnt.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. She/he looks for adventures and likes to take risks. She/he wants to have an exciting life.

ipbhprp.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him always to behave properly. She/he wants to avoid doing anything people would say is wrong.

iprspot.description: Important to get respect from others
iprspot.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to get respect from others. She/he wants people to do what she/he says.

iplylfr.description: Important to be loyal to friends and devote to people close
iplylfr.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is important to her/him to be loyal to her/his friends. She/he wants to devote herself/himself to people close to her/him.

impenv.description: Important to care for nature and environment
impenv.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. It is very important to her/him to care for nature. Looking after the environment is important to her/him.

imptrad.description: Important to follow traditions and customs
imptrad.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. Tradition is important to her/him. She/he tries to follow the customs handed down by her/his religion or her/his family.

impfun.description: Important to seek fun and things that give pleasure
impfun.question: I will briefly describe a person. Please tell me how much this person is or is not like you. She/he seeks every chance she/he can to have fun. It is important to her/him to do things that give her/him pleasure.
